Estimate the Nusselt number from the Reynolds number (based on Mitchell 1976)

Source: R/energybalance_functions.R
Nu_from_Re.Rd

Estimate the Nusselt number from the Reynolds number (based on Mitchell 1976)

Nu_from_Re(Re, taxa = "cylinder")

Arguments

Re

is the Reynolds Number (dimensionless)
taxa

Which class of organism, current choices: sphere, cylinder, frog, lizard_traverse_to_air_flow, lizard_parallel_to_air_flow, lizard_surface, lizard_elevated, flyinginsect, spider

Value

Nusselt number (dimensionless)

Details

This function allows you to estimate the Nusselt number from the Reynolds number for various taxa. Source: Mitchell JW. 1976. Heat transfer from spheres and other animal forms. Biophysical Journal 16: 561-569. See Table 1. Convective Heat Trasfer Relations for Animal Shapes.

See also

Other biophysical models: Free_or_forced_convection, Grashof_number_Gates, Grashof_number, Nu_from_Gr, Nusselt_number, Prandtl_number, Qconduction_animal, Qconduction_substrate, Qconvection, Qemitted_thermal_radiation, Qevaporation, Qmetabolism_from_mass_temp, Qmetabolism_from_mass, Qnet_Gates, Qradiation_absorbed, Qthermal_radiation_absorbed, Reynolds_number, Tb_CampbellNorman, Tb_Fei, Tb_Gates, Tb_butterfly, Tb_grasshopper, Tb_lizard, Tb_salamander_humid, Tsoil, actual_vapor_pressure, boundary_layer_resistance, external_resistance_to_water_vapor_transfer, heat_transfer_coefficient_approximation, heat_transfer_coefficient_simple, heat_transfer_coefficient, saturation_vapor_pressure, saturation_water_vapor_pressure

Examples

if (FALSE) {
Nu_from_Re(Re=5, taxa="cylinder")
}
